Translations.Text: loot ne kahaah ye meree putriyaan hain, yadi tum kuchh karane vaale[1] ho
he nabee! aapakee aayu kee shapath[1]! vaastav mein, ve apane unmaad mein bahak rahe the
antatah, sooryoday ke samay unhen ek kadee dhvani ne pakad liya
phir hamane us bastee ke ooparee bhaag ko neeche kar diya aur unapar kankareele patthar barasa diye
vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain, pratibhaashaaliyon[1] ke lie
aur vah (bastee) saadhaaran[1] maarg par sthit hai
nihsandeh isamen badee nishaanee hai, eemaan valon ke lie
aur vaastav mein, (aiyka) ke[1] vaasee atyaachaaree the
to hamane unase badala le liya aur ve donon[1] hee saadhaaran maarg par hain

aur unhen hamane apanee aayaten (nishaaniyaan) deen, to ve unase vimukh hee rahe
ve shilaakaaree karake parvaton se ghar banaate aur nirbhay hokar rahate the
antatah, unhen kadee dhvani ne bhor ke samay pakad liya
aur unakee kamaee unake kuchh kaam na aayee

aur hamane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, saty ke aadhaar par hee utpann kiya hai aur nishchay pralay aanee hai. atah (he nabee!) aap (unhen) bhale taur par kshama kar den
vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee sabaka sreshta, sarvagy hai
tatha (he nabee!) hamane aapako saat aisee aayaten, jo baar-baar duharaee jaatee hain aur maha quraan[1] pradaan kiya hai
aur aap, usakee or na dekhen, jo saansaarik laabh ka sansaadhan hamane unamen se vibhinn prakaar ke logon ko de rakha hai aur na unapar shok karen aur eemaan vaalon ke lie susheel rahen
aur kah den ki main pratyaksh (khulee) chetaavanee[1] dene vaala hoon
jaise hamane khandan kaariyon[1] par (yaatana) utaaree
